item.title: My website as Code
item.description: My new website This is the article for the 2nd day of qiita advent calendar. Hi, this is my new personal website! My old website is still alive here (http://old.yushiomote.org), but I plan to remove it in the near future. It's been a while since I wrote my last article. I even haven't logged in my old personal server for a long time. I forgot almost all the settings in my old personal server.
